Reviews.Title: Great Smart phone for Nextel Direct Connect Users.
Reviews.Author: Jay Lew
Reviews.Content: This is as good as gets for us Nextel Direct Connect users.I just removed my SIM card from my old phone and placed in this one,and I was ready to go.Just know that you will be required to upgrade to a data plan if you get this phone, which can be more expensive.If you choose not to upgrade to a data plan you will not be able to send/receive text messages or use the internet except for WIFI. You will only be able to send/receive calls and use direct connect.

Reviews.Title: Nextel 8350i Blackberry Curve
Reviews.Author: The old fireman
Reviews.Content: Great phone, does everything a smart phone should do very well.  Most importantly, to me, it's top quality PHONE: grabs the cell signal, clear sound both ways, never drops the call.  This phone is made in Canada not China like all the others.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: I had a few minor problems with the product, but the seller did every needed to fix it and make it right. I received the phone in great condition, and since the issue I had with the battery was resolved it has been working great. Great buy for the price!

Reviews.Title: 2nd Best Nextel Phone
Reviews.Author: Nasty Nick
Reviews.Content: If you are thinking of buying this phone for nextel don't bother.  I absolutely hated this phone the motorola brute can do everything this phone can do and more plus everything you buy a blackberry for doesn't work on this blackberry, i.e. text messaging and picture messaging. Save your time and money and stay the hell away from this phone.

Reviews.Title: Good price and good product
Reviews.Author: Hfrancis "EzPhoto"
Reviews.Content: It is good price for something not easy to find.If you go to Nextel and buy a new one.They charge you with a two year contract for $99.00 plus taxes monthly...it will be more than $2400.00 andmore if you have to buy the blackberry for $129.00Only thing is it come without box only the blackberry and it charger... but anywayWill you use the carton box for talking and testing?You could compare...

Reviews.Title: Good Phone - But, Nextel no longer exists
Reviews.Author: DL
Reviews.Content: Love Blackberry and Blackberry phones. This handset was great.But, this was their Nextel phone - which has since been 'Sunsetted' by Sprint.So, now this handset is no longer valid on any carrier.

Reviews.Title: Very cool BB
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: Design and size are ok. Good resolution in screen, no problem with sign level.  You can use it in other country with Nextel local service.

Reviews.Title: not new
Reviews.Author: Mao Chang
Reviews.Content: too expensive for a refurbished cell pone, which wasn't specified in the product description. i want my money back soon.

Reviews.Title: Good for Obsolete Phone
Reviews.Author: Marco A. De Llano
Reviews.Content: I wanted a smartphone for Nextel iDen network and this fits the bill. It is an obsolete phone and wasn't going to pay full retail price to Nextel so a refurbished is a good compromise for an obsolete network as I am forced to use it.

Reviews.Title: read this
Reviews.Author: Nextel Blackberry Curve 8350i Cell Phone
Reviews.Content: the entry of a cell is broken the truth is that I did not think k were sending so I can not load it just ask one thing I need one more please rebicen the phone before sending .....Nextel Blackberry Curve 8350i Cell Phone

Reviews.Title: Not sprint compatible  had to return the phone
Reviews.Author: Glenn Galvin
Reviews.Content: The phone could not be connected to the sprint network, so it was of no use to me and had to be returned

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: YVOLPZ
Reviews.Content: The phone works fine. I recieved it like 2 days later. It had everything in and everything was new. Loved it

Reviews.Title: Okay phone
Reviews.Author: D. B. Lawton "Dr. Roof"
Reviews.Content: The absolute WORST Thing about this phone is the fact that it is on SPRINT's network. If this phone was on Verizon's network, it would be a great buy!

Reviews.Title: my bb 8350i
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: this phone has worked fantastic, since the day i got it... :D i've had it for almost over a year and have not had any problems w/it.

Reviews.Title: orderinstant customer service
Reviews.Author: From Virginia
Reviews.Content: I ordered a phone Anita from Order instant worked with me until we solved the problem.  Great company to work with.  She was very understanding and will to work with me,  Highly recomend ordering with them.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL PURCHASE
Reviews.Author: JERRY
Reviews.Content: HELLO EVERYBODY. I WOULD LIKE TO TELL YOU ALL THAT THIS PHONE WAS REALLY GOOD, I AM TOTALLY SATISFIED WITH MY PURCHASE AND I DO RECOMMEND TO EVERYBODY WHO LIKES THIS TYPE OF PHONE. LONG LIFE TO BLACKBERRY!!!

Reviews.Title: excellent phone needs antenna
Reviews.Author: thepest_us
Reviews.Content: great phone with wifi works with boost needs updating to go on boost but that was free also. wish it had antenna port and it dont

Reviews.Title: Is not NEW
Reviews.Author: ledinas
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone thinking it was new as I said at the announcement, but is not new, and also worked for the phone I had to unlock to work with BOOST MOBILE.

Reviews.Title: muito ruim...... very bad,,,,,
Reviews.Author: arnaldo
Reviews.Content: produto informado que estava em bom estado, pois o estado e muito ruimmmmmm,  nextel VERY BAD okBlackBerry 8350i Curve for Nextel (Black) Sprint - QWERTY - Wi-Fi - No Contract Required - nextel todo arranhado, acabadocom muito desgaste, muito feio, BAD, ....

Reviews.Title: Nextel
Reviews.Author: Ivan D. Aquino Lavado
Reviews.Content: Andrew you communicates via mail conmi person and he/she promised to give the best solution soon what demonstrates salesperson's seriousness.Excuses for the nuisance but not taenia answer some.

Reviews.Title: not a good phone
Reviews.Author: Thanh Au "t_13"
Reviews.Content: this is not a good phone. do not buy it. you will be wasting your money, especially if you are with Sprint.

ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry 8350i Curve Nextel Boost Mobile Pda Cell Phone
